articles.title: Ukraine, Russia to pore over memoranda exchanged at talks — Foreign Ministry
articles.summary: "As agreed on May 16, the Russian side handed over to the Ukrainian delegation a detailed two-part memorandum outlining its position on ways to achieve long-term peace and a possible full-fledged ceasefire," Maria Zakharova said

articles.title: Russian gymnasts reflect on return to world stage
articles.summary:
Russian athletes have finished fourth in the overall medal count at the 2025 Artistic Gymnastics World Championships in Jakarta

articles.title: Ex-EU justice head charged with money laundering
articles.summary:
Former EU Commissioner Didier Reynders, who oversaw the bloc’s seizure of Russian assets, has been charged with money laundering
Read Full Article at RT.com

articles.title: Draft bill in South Africa seeks tougher controls on opinion polls
articles.summary:
ActionSA, an opposition party that introduced the measure, is calling for an oversight body to ensure compliance by polling firms

articles.title: Man gropes Mexico’s president (VIDEO)
articles.summary:
Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum was groped during a public walk in the capital on Tuesday

articles.summary: "As agreed on May 16, the Russian side handed over to the Ukrainian delegation a detailed two-part memorandum outlining its position on ways to achieve long-term peace and a possible full-fledged ceasefire," Maria Zakharova said

articles.title: Russia, Ukraine to agree on date of new round of talks after memorandums are studied
articles.summary: "It will take some time to examine the draft memorandums that have been exchanged," Dmitry Peskov said

articles.title: Russia to take all measures to solve crime related to attacks on airfields — Kremlin
articles.summary: Dmitry Peskov said that everything that must be done to resolve this crime will be done

articles.title: France, Belgium oppose ban on gas imports from Russia to EU — Politico
articles.summary: Representatives of French and Belgian governments said that they need “more reassurances on the economic and legal consequences of the move before making a decision”

articles.title: Europe’s gas stocks replenishment slower than usual, situation becomes tense
articles.summary: According to Gazprom, 8.9 bln cubic meters of gas were injected into European UGS facilities in May, which 1.1 bln cubic meters less than the average for that month over the past ten years
